hp-platinum-3080.name: HP Platinum 3080
hp-platinum-3080.description: A dynamic pc for both work and leisure. Its mid level processors make it the perfect choice for casual PC users.

macbook-air.name: Macbook Air
macbook-air.description: A powerful computer perfect for high powered graphics work and casual gaming

asus-rog.name: Asus Rog
asus-rog.description: This computer is a beast. Perfect for hardcore gaming, and consuming design and computations

lenovo-think-pad.name: Lenovo ThinkPad
lenovo-think-pad.description: Think casual, light, fun. The computer for the outdoorsy person who just needs a connection to the web.

hp-weboid.name: HP Weboid
hp-weboid.description: The PC for whenever you want to give out that geeky vibe

hp-platinum-4080.name: HP Platinum 4080
hp-platinum-4080.description: It's the HP Platinum 3080, but better.

hp-weboid-pro.name: HP Weboid Pro
hp-weboid-pro.description: When you're a geek but have a bit too much money to spend

lenovo-think-pad-2.name: Lenovo ThinkPad 2
lenovo-think-pad-2.description: It's literally the same thing as the original ThinkPad but we made it worse a little

asus-grog.name: Asus Grog
asus-grog.description: Word of advice: Just buy the Rog, this one's trash

macbook-air-pro.name: Macbook Air Pro
macbook-air-pro.description: We changed absolutely nothing but doubled the price

beatster.name: Beatster
beatster.description: Wireless, great audio, what more could a music lover want?

beatster pro.name: Beatster Pro
beatster pro.description: Wireless, great audio for double the price!

oraimo-headphones.name: Beatster Pro
oraimo-headphones.description: It's oraimo! You know it's good :)

oraimo-headphones-max.name: Oraimo Headphones Max
oraimo-headphones-max.description: Perfect audio rendering, noise cancellation and comfortable buds.
